```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(tidyverse)
library(psych)
library(kableExtra)
library(reprores)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data_Sleep_Fatigue_AlcoholUse <- read_csv('df_Sleep_Fatigue_AlcoholUse.csv')

filtered_data <- data.frame('Trait self-control' = data_Sleep_Fatigue_AlcoholUse$TSC,
                            'Concentration (CIS)' = data_Sleep_Fatigue_AlcoholUse$CIS_Concentration, 
                            'Disturbances in sleep quality (PSQI)' = data_Sleep_Fatigue_AlcoholUse$PSQI_GlobalScore, 
                            'Chronotype (MCTQ)' = data_Sleep_Fatigue_AlcoholUse$MCTQ_MSFsc, 
                            'Alcohol usage (AUDIT)' =  data_Sleep_Fatigue_AlcoholUse$AUDIT_Score)

description_filtered_data <- subset(filtered_data, select = -c(vars, range, se))

rownames(description_filtered_data) <- c('Trait self-control', 'Concentration (CIS)', 'Disturbances in sleep quality (PSQI)', 'Chronotype (MCTQ)', 'Alcohol usage (AUDIT)')
```
